overview:
Cameron Powell is Senior Vice President of Strategic Development at Earth Class Mail.

Cameron’s background includes business development for emerging companies, putting companies online, and intellectual property law. He co-founded an Internet marketing and search engine advertising firm and two executive coaching firms. He was previously VP of Business Development of SnapNames.

Prior to SnapNames, he worked at the Corporate Executive Board (NYSE: EXBD) as a consultant and public speaker; the Top Ten law firm of Foley & Lardner, as an IP lawyer and litigator, and the George Washington University Law Center as an adjunct professor. Prior, he served as a judicial clerk for the Chief Judge of the U.S. District Court for the District of Colorado.

Cameron has a B.S. in Business Administration from the University of Colorado at Boulder, summa cum laude and valedictorian, and holds a J.D. from Harvard Law School.

Source:Earth Class Mail
